generic <typename T> public ref class DataServiceQueryContinuation sealed : System::Data::Services::Client::DataServiceQueryContinuation

summary.span: 封装返回已分页的 WCF Data Services 查询结果的下一页的 URI。

span.span: Encapsulates a URI that returns the next page of a paged WCF Data Services query result.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `do…while` 循环从数据服务的分页结果中加载 `Customers` 实体。This example uses a `do…while` loop to load `Customers` entities from a paged results from the data service. [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#GetCustomersPaged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria_northwind_client/cs/source.cs#getcustomerspaged)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#GetCustomersPaged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria_northwind_client/vb/source.vb#getcustomerspaged)]

related.span: 加载延迟的内容（WCF 数据服务）
